name: Cascade
description:
Having fallen into the cascade interstice without a weapon, the beasts within must be faced and a weapon must be acquired.

(Works in Google Chrome, Doesn’t work in Microsoft Edge, Reported to not work in Safari, May or may not work in Firefox)

Keyboard Controls:

Space - Confirm

Esc - Cancel

WASD - Move

Move Mouse - Aim

Right Mouse - Dodge

Left Mouse - Attack (Once a weapon is acquired)

P - Pause / View Password

Gamepad Controls:

A - Confirm

B - Cancel

Left Analog Stick - Move

Right Analog Stick - Aim

LB / LT / L1 / L2 - Dodge

RB / RT / R1 / R2 - Attack (Once a weapon is acquired)

X - Pause / View Password
